description: This is the first live home video in Ozzy's illustrious solo career. The nearly two-hour program was filmed by director Jeb Brien throughout Ozzy's tow 1992 sold-out U.S. tours, "Theater of Madness" and "No More Tours," and includes many of Ozzy's biggest hits.
